SELECT *
INTO Dimension.Suppliers
FROM Integration.Suppliers 


SELECT p.PurchaseSKey
	, p.[OrderDate]
	, p.SupplierSKey
	, p.[StockItemID]
	, p.[PurchaseOrderID]
	, p.[OrderedOuters]
	, p.[ReceivedOuters]
	, p.[PackageTypeID]
	, p.[IsOrderFinalized]
INTO Fact.Purchase
FROM Integration.Purchase p


SELECT t.TransSKey
	, t.[TransactionDate]
	, t.SupplierSKey
	, t.[TransactionTypeID]
	, t.[PaymentMethodID]
	, t.[SupplierTransactionID]
	, t.[PurchaseOrderID]
	, t.[SupplierInvoiceNumber]
	, t.[AmountExcludingTax]
	, t.[TaxAmount]
	, t.[TransactionAmount]
	, t.[OutstandingBalance]
	, t.[IsFinalized]
INTO Fact.Transactions
FROM Integration.Transactions t

SELECT * FROM Fact.Transactions
SELECT * FROM Dimension.Suppliers

DECLARE @sql0 NVARCHAR(max)=''
SELECT @sql0 += ' Drop table ' + QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) + '.'+ QUOTENAME(TABLE_NAME) + '; '
FROM   INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
WHERE  table_schema = 'Integration'
Exec Sp_executesql @sql0

DECLARE @sql nvarchar(max)
DECLARE @sql2 nvarchar(max)
SET @sql ='DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS Integration'
SET @sql2 = 'CREATE SCHEMA Integration'
EXEC sp_executesql @sql
EXEC sp_executesql @sql2

SELECT s.SurKey as SupplierSKey
	, s.SupplierID
	, s.[SupplierName]
	, c.[SupplierCategoryName]
	, s.[PrimaryContactPersonID]
	, s.[SupplierReference]
	, s.[PaymentDays]
	, s.[PostalPostalCode]
	, s.[ValidFrom]
	, s.[ValidTo]
	, s.[IngestTime]
INTO Integration.Suppliers
FROM [Purchasing].[Surrogate_Suppliers] s
LEFT JOIN Purchasing.Surrogate_SupplierCategories c 
	ON s.[SupplierCategoryID] = c.[SupplierCategoryID]


SELECT ol.SurKey as PurchaseSKey
	, s.SurKey as SupplierSKey
	, o.[OrderDate]
	, o.[PurchaseOrderID]
	, ol.[OrderedOuters]
	, ol.[ReceivedOuters]
	, ol.[PackageTypeID]
	, o.[IsOrderFinalized]
	, o.[SupplierID]
	, ol.[StockItemID]
	, o.[LastEditedWhen]
	, ol.IngestTime
INTO Integration.Purchase
FROM [Purchasing].[Surrogate_PurchaseOrderLines] ol
LEFT JOIN Purchasing.Surrogate_PurchaseOrders o
	ON ol.[PurchaseOrderID] = o.[PurchaseOrderID]
LEFT JOIN Purchasing.Surrogate_Suppliers s
	ON o.SupplierID = s.SupplierID


SELECT t.SurKey as TransSKey
	, t.[TransactionDate]
	, s.SurKey as SupplierSKey
	, t.[SupplierTransactionID]
	, t.[PurchaseOrderID]
	, t.[SupplierInvoiceNumber]
	, t.[AmountExcludingTax]
	, t.[TaxAmount]
	, t.[TransactionAmount]
	, t.[OutstandingBalance]
	, t.[IsFinalized]
	, t.[SupplierID]
	, t.[TransactionTypeID]
	, t.[PaymentMethodID]
	, t.[LastEditedWhen]
	, t.IngestTime
INTO Integration.Transactions
FROM [Purchasing].[Surrogate_SupplierTransactions] t
LEFT JOIN Purchasing.Surrogate_Suppliers s
	ON t.SupplierID = s.SupplierID

SELECT * 
From Integration.Suppliers

DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(max)=''

SELECT @sql += ' Truncate table ' + QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) + '.'+ QUOTENAME(TABLE_NAME) + '; '
FROM   INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
WHERE  TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'

Exec Sp_executesql @sql
